data.script:
<script>
    import {
        TextInput,
        Stack,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack.Container
    orientation="horizontal"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <TextInput value="DEFAULT TextInput" span_x="20" />

    <TextInput
        alignment_x="left"
        value="LEFT TextInput"
        span_x="20"
    />

    <TextInput
        alignment_x="center"
        value="CENTER TextInput"
        span_x="20"
    />

    <TextInput
        alignment_x="right"
        value="RIGHT TextInput"
        span_x="20"
    />

    <TextInput
        alignment_x="justify"
        value="JUSTIFY TextInput"
        span_x="20"
    />
</Stack.Container>
data.title: TextInput Alignment
